title: 1936 Copa del Presidente de la República
text:
The Copa del Presidente de la República 1936 "(President of the Republic's Cup)" was the 36th staging of the <a href="Copa%20del%20Rey">Copa del Rey</a>, the <a href="Spain">Spanish</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> cup competition.
The competition started in February, 1936 and concluded on June 21, 1936, with the final, held at the <a href="Estadio%20Mestalla">Mestalla</a> stadium in <a href="Valencia">Valencia</a>. <a href="Real%20Madrid">Real Madrid</a>, known as Madrid FC under the <a href="Second%20Spanish%20Republic">Second Spanish Republic</a>, won the match 2-1 for their seventh cup victory, defeating <a href="FC%20Barcelona">FC Barcelona</a> in the first "<a href="El%20Cl%C3%A1sico">El Clásico</a>" final. Defending champions <a href="Sevilla%20FC">Sevilla FC</a> lost to <a href="H%C3%A9rcules%20CF">Hércules CF</a> in a Round-of-16 replay.
It was the final season before the tournament was cancelled due to the <a href="Spanish%20Civil%20War">Spanish Civil War</a>, returning in 1939 as the Copa del Generalísimo.
